description: Single and two storey side extension, single and two storey rear extension,  conservatory to rear; front porch, alterations to front elevation and roof, rooflights in front and rear roofslopes, external alterations (demolition of attached garage; porch; canopy and rear extension).
decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:&nbsp;<span style="line-height: normal;">268-03-A080-20; 268-03-A100-20; 268-03-A130-17; 268-03-A140-17; 268-04-HOT-A.01; 268-04-HOT-A.02; 268-04-HOT-A.03; Heritage Impact Statement; Design and Access Statement; Reasonable Exception Statement;&nbsp;</span><span style="line-height: normal;">268-03-A130-17</span>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.
